name: Slap It To Cook It
description:
To continue, please check this video first: 

Inspired by this folk, I decided to make a clicker game in which you can also MAKE SCIENCE! all you need to do is slap this chicken as fast as you can and while you're at it you can also buy some upgrades or extra hands for faster slaps!

Your progress will be stored online and your record time will be available at our leaderboard, where you can check how well you're performing! You will need internet connection to play this game.

The game have two currencies, coins which you can get by playing and rubies, which a 100 are given when you start your account. Rubies simulates hard currencies (the ones you play in game to obtain), so use them wisely since you're only given a 100!

If there is any problem or error please let me know! I'll try to fix it ASAP.

Note: if you're playing on Android, downloading the APK file and installing it will give you the best experience possible. If you want to use the Web version anyway, please opt for using the guest login, since the virtual keyboard for login/registering won't pop up.

Currently not supported on iPhone or Mac.

  • Kitchen 3D Model: Simple House Kitchen - Fernando Alves
  • Raw Chicken 3D Model: Raw Chicken - Nathan Sioui
  • Game UI: pzUH
